Key Match Events: Liton Das scored 60 runs off 27 balls for Bangladesh.
KL Rahul scored a 32-ball 50 and executed a direct hit to run out Liton Das.
Bangladesh lost to India by 5 runs (DLS Method) at the Adelaide Oval.
Taskin Ahmed bowled at an economy rate of 3.75.
Taskin Ahmed and Nurul Hasan Sohan tried to take Bangladesh over the finish line but failed.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 16 overs per side.
